recipesJson.name: cucumber and basil water
recipesJson.author: BOZO63
recipesJson.description: i changed the title and image of this recipe because some may have found it offensive.........cap cucumber and  flv basil are the main notes , flv ginger snap and tpa honeysuckle back up the basil , while the cactus , lemon and sweet guava brighten up the cucumber....okay off the shake but better after a day or two......may drop the honeysuckle to 1%.....we'll see after a couple of days....ok made some adjustments,look for v2...
